title: Salt and Sanctuary v1.0.0.4
description:
Install instructions:
- Download and unzip
- Play (launch that game via salt.exe)

Changelog:
- Added controls reset to defaults
- Implemented crash logging (crash logs appear as crash.log in game directory)
- Fixed strong mace attack requiring no stamina
- Fixed work menu exploit allowing one turn-in to earn all turn-ins
- Fixed missing mouse support to Candlelit lady dialog
- Fixed mouse causing store items to show as 0 gp
- Fixed throwables: now able to hold throw as with crossbows/arrows
- Swapped gamepad LT/L2/RT/R2 icons for arrows when using mouse
- Removed LT/L2/RT/R2 in some windows when using mouse
- Fixed Light Armor skill node appearing as Assassin when using mouse
- Implemented mouse alternative to L3 stat toggle
- Updated German strings
